Entries.7_2: There's nothing like a nice ripe, juicy peach in the summer, right?%revealtasteRobin636#$b#Robin and I used to go down to the local farmers market and buy them by the box, back when we lived in the city.#$e#Here, I've got an extra, do you want it?[636]
Entries.12_2: The mushrooms we see and eat? That's just the fruiting body.#$e#There's actually a lot more to the mushroom, just under the surface.$h

Entries.7_2: Mushrooms are actually closer to animals than plants!
